Class BaseTextUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.TextUI

          • org.netbeans.editor.BaseTextUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, DocumentListener, ViewFactory, AtomicLockListener

    public class BaseTextUI
extends BasicTextUI
implements PropertyChangeListener, DocumentListener, AtomicLockListener
